articles.description: "This guy's not hanging it up," Beane said about Miller
articles.content: "We decided last week that he did need a scope. He kind of let it all calm down, and multiple opinions. We sent him to Dallas on Monday (for evaluation and scope)," Beane said. "He had some concern a… [+883 chars]

articles.title: NCAA granting Virginia football players who were in their final seasons of eligibility additional year of eligibility - The Daily Progress
articles.description: The NCAA will grant any UVa football player whose college eligibility expired this past season an extra year to play, a response to the shooting on Grounds that killed three
